item.description:
***Update: Practice is on, it's 50 degrees out and sunny-see you on the field!

Official NHC COED Softball Team will be holding a team practice/ pickup game on Thursday, April, 19th, 2007, at 5pm at Memorial Field in East Haven, CT. approx 5 miles from downtown New Haven. Normal game nights will be Thursday starting in May.

If you are not a team member and are interested in just playing softball or getting some exercise, you are welcome as well.


Memorial Field in located at the intersection of Dodge Avenue and Roma Street, in East Haven.


Mapquest Map
item.name: ***NHC SOFTBALL TEAM PRACTICE is ON TODAY!!!
